Title: Dandelion Sky
Writer: Ty Franck (based on the novels by), Daniel Abraham (based on the novels by), Mark Fergus (developed by), Hawk Ostby (developed by), Georgia Lee (written for television by), Hallie Lambert (staff writer)
Actors: Steven Strait, Cas Anvar, Dominique Tipper, Wes Chatham
Plot: Holden sees past, present, and future; a ghost from Melba's past threatens her mission; Bobbie struggles to trust an old friend as she leads a group into uncharted territory.
